original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya

original: 17.20. Kusalattika, Sanidassanattika
analyzed: kusala attika sa nidassana ttika

original: Abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo naabyākatassa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Tīṇi veditakaṁ kātabbaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākataḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na abyākatassa na sa nidassana sappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi veditakam kātabba

original: Ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate cha.
analyzed: ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā tīṇi upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate cha

original: Abyākataṁ anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo
analyzed: abyākatam anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā abyākatam anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ

original: naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ anidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā abyākatam anidassana sappaṭigha

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Kusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo
analyzed: kusalam a nidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na a nidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam a nidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ

original: naanidassanaappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na anidassana appaṭighaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na anidassana appaṭighaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Akusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo
analyzed: akusalam a nidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na a nidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā akusalam anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā akusalam anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ

original: naanidassanaappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na anidassana appaṭighaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na anidassana appaṭighaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Abyākataṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo
analyzed: abyākatam anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā abyākatam anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā abyākatam anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ

original: naanidassanaappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na anidassana appaṭighaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na anidassana appaṭighaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Kusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca abyākataṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: kusalam a nidassana appaṭigham ca abyākatam a nidassana appaṭigham ca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Akusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca abyākataṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: akusalam a nidassana appaṭigham ca abyākatam a nidassana appaṭigham ca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā pannarasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pannarasa.
analyzed: hetuyā pannarasa adhipatiyā pannarasa pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pannarasa
